text: @realDonaldTrump Trump’s COVID19 “hoax” has now KILLED 40 THOUSAND AMERICANS. His desperate attempt to rewrite well documented history failed.  His berating and bullying of governors failed. Yet his lies and corruption continue. GOP Senators accomplices. When do Congressional hearings begin?
